text: Halle Lynn Bailey (born March 27, 2000) is an American singer and actress. She is best known for portraying Ariel in the 2023 live-action film The Little Mermaid. Bailey began singing and acting at a young age. She formed an R&B; music duo with her sister Chloe Bailey. The duo were noticed by Beyonc√©, who signed them to her record label Parkwood Entertainment. Halle and Chloe have released two albums together and earned five Grammy Award nominations. Following her lead role as Ariel in The Little Mermaid, Halle Bailey began a solo career and released her first single "Angel". == Sources == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Atlanta Category:Actors from Atlanta
title: Halle Bailey
